name: Runner's Adventure
description:
Runner's Adventure is a fun endless runner type game where you must try to get as far as possible while dodging various obstacles and wild animals while trying to collect coins, diamonds and chests that will allow you to unlock different characters and scenarios, each with its own setting and unique obstacles.

In Runner's Adventure you can find and use four incredible powers that will help you go further or obtain more rewards.

Game Features:

-Intuitive and easy-to-use interface

-Amazing background music

-Wild animals as obstacles

- Scenarios with beautiful landscapes

-4 fun powers

-Exciting avatars to choose from

-Excellent gameplay and good graphics

-Fun missions and good rewards

-Two frames to help you go further
